page.title: 03Daily Life
page.content: Most of the days in my life are exactly the same. In the mornings I get up and have my breakfast. Then I get dressed and go to school. I find that the evenings are what make them different; for instance Mondays I have rounders after school and Brownies which are good fun. Tuesdays I have athletics, then on Wednesdays I have recorders and modern dance at the local secondary school. On Thursday I have country dancing and after that I go to Guides. We do things like papier mache and we play games; we also have special uniforms to wear. On Friday evening I have a tap class which is run by a lady called Mrs Frankley. She is a very kind lady and is good at tap Saturday mornings there is no school and at 10.30 I have my Ballet class which is very good. Sunday is my only day off which I spend with my family.
